main event: A retired admiral reported sighting a large, fast-moving, metallic object near Baltimore, Maryland on February 27, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a bus or large truck, with a smooth, metallic appearance and an elliptical or cigar-shaped form.
The object had no wings, propellers, or visible engines, and made no sound.
The object accelerated rapidly and left the area in a matter of seconds, according to the witness.
The witness had initially thought the object was a military plane or helicopter, but it behaved in an unusual manner.
The witness provided a detailed description of the object and its characteristics.
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
